name: cheater
content:

mainly US (UK usually cheat) a person who behaves in a dishonest way in order to win or get an advantage: The Inland Revenue has many ways to catch cheaters. Athletes who break the rules to win are cheaters.

informal a person who has a secret sexual relationship with someone who is not their husband, wife, or usual sexual partner: Emma found out her boyfriend was a cheater. I can understand someone staying with a cheater if they have small children to care for.
More examplesFewer examplesWe need the media to hold liars, bullies, and cheaters accountable.Their job is to screen athletes' blood and urine samples and catch cheaters. If you're married to a serial cheater, they will probably never change.
